about_the_game:
Castlehold is an innovative competitive strategy game, featuring the new Active Resource Control (ARC) System. Build your Army, lead your troops into Battle and see how you stack up against your opponent in fast-paced, strategic combat.

ACTIVE RESOURCE CONTROL (ARC)

Controlling or denying enemy gold-generating Villages on the Battlefield is the key to victory. You must decide when to hold onto your Villages, enabling you to deploy stronger, more expensive troops, when to advance taking the enemy’s Villages, and when to strategically retreat.


COLLECT YOUR TROOPS YOUR WAY

Recruit Squads of randomized Soldiers or directly acquire up to 4 daily Units not currently in your collection – all with the currency you’ve gained from Leveling Up and completing Quests. Win or lose, you’ll gain XP and earn currency rewards when you Level Up.


A WAR ACROSS TIME

Castlehold is set in a world where time and space have collapsed. Remnants of kingdoms and cities, both modern and old, have spread across islands over a vast ocean known as the Drift. Latent powers have awoken within humanity and those with selfish ambitions used their newfound abilities to reign over this new chaos. Now it is time to for you to raise an army and liberate the Remnants from their tyrannical oppressors.

GAME FEATURES

- Simple to learn, but difficult to master strategies

- Command 5 Free Captains across 4 Free Battlefields
- 300 Early Access Soldiers in Total (150x2)
- 70 Soldiers unlocked when you start (35x2)
- Ranked Ladder, Casual Play, and Friend Play Modes
- No class-based Army restrictions, mix and match your Units your way!
- More Modes and Additional Troops to come!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX | AMD Radeon 6870 HD series (or higher)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.7 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX-1060 | AMD Radeon RX 570 series (or higher)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
